strapiPost.title: Extra First Thursday Event Happening This Week
strapiPost.content:
Dog Daze Do-Over is happening this Thursday as an extra-special First Thursday event! 

  • Activities: Because Dog Daze was canceled in August due to weather, itâ€™s happening in September! Furry friends and their humans can look forward to a costumed canines pageant, live music, food trucks, a pup parade, art vendors, galleries, and more! 
  • Details: The special First Thursday event is free, open to the public, and will take place on the Fayetteville Square from 5:30-9p. 

Click HERE for more information.
